revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Dell |model=Kace M300 |revision=(Mini V2.0) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |price=2498 |est_release_date=07/2011 |type=asset management appliance, network security platform, security appliance |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.58 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L4006EM1I-12G |fla2=16 GiB |fla2_brand=Transcend |fla2_model=SSD (SATA) |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41J512M8THD-15E:D |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Alcor Micro Corp;AU6254;;1;,,, 1MHz, 4.5A Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR terminator Regulator;TI;TPS51100;;1;,,, Wide-Input Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS40055;;1;,,, 30V, 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS8984;;1;,,, 4.5V to 18V Input, Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;TI;TPS65251;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell v3.4.27; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31-8;Debian 6.0.1; |default_ip=192.168.2.100 |oui_eth=18:03:73 }} {{TagLine|Dell Kace M300 Asset Management Appliance}} :[https://www1.la.dell.com/ky/en/corp/Networking-Solutions/kace-m300/pd.aspx?refid=kace-m300&s=corp Product page]
"Kace_Mini V2.0" and "2011.04.12" is silkscreened on both sides of board. :OS is installed on a 16GB Transcend SSD using the SATA port.
*OEM: [[USI]] - ''Universal Scientific Industrial (Shanghai)''
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6282 @2.0GHz ARM (v5) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 512KB (CMOS) Serial Flash, :16GB SSD ''Transcend'' (SATA II) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 19V 1.58A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Dell Kace M300 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Dell Kace M300 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Dell Kace M300 Internal.jpeg|Internal Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
